body.name: Portable Garment Steamer for Clothes, Garments, Fabrics Removes Wrinkles for Fresh Clothing, Fast Heat and Auto Off, Handheld Travel Steamer with Detachable 300ml Water Tank

features: Handheld Wrinkle Remover – This portable garment steamer heats up in just 25 seconds and helps get wrinkles out of clothes and fabrics quickly for a fresh, crease-free look. This steamer will de-wrinkle and sanitize not only your clothes, but curtains and drapery, tablecloths, bedding, upholstery, toys, and much more.

All-Purpose Fabric Support – Our steam machine can be used on most fabrics, such as cotton, silk, linen, polyester, wool, velvet, and other common blends and weaves. The portable handheld steamer can save space as there is no ironing board needed. This is not only great for your home, but also great for your travel. We’ve also included a 2-in-1 fabric and lint brush with each steam, to give you more versatility at home or on the go.
Unique Leak-Proof Technology – An electronic pump system stops water from spitting and spilling! This allows you to steam your clothes while they’re hanging vertically or lying horizontally.

Safe and Easy to Use – The steamer is designed with full security guidelines. The automatic shut-down system activates whenever the steamer is too hot, or the water level is too low, to keep you safe from every kind of accident. The portable steamer is certified by Electrical Testing Laboratories in compliance with North American safety standards.
Satisfaction – Every MagicPro steamer comes with a hassle-free 1-year , 30-day refund, and unbeatable customer service for a risk-free purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Running late? With Magicpro Steamer, ready in just 25 SECONDS, you can remove even the toughest wrinkles in no time and keep your clothes neat and fresh.

SAFE AND EASY TO USE The steamer is designed with full security guidelines. The automatic shut-down system keeps you safe from every kind of accidents, whenever the steamer is too hot or the water level is too low. UNIQUE LEAK-PROOF TECHNOLOGY Electronic Pump System that stops water from spitting and spilling, allows to steam your clothes while hanging vertically or lying horizontally. Certified by ETL Compliance to North American Safety Standards.
The best gift for your family and friends!

ALL-PURPOSE FABRIC SUPPORT Our steam machine can be used on most fabrics such as cotton, silk, linen, polyester, wool, velvet, and other common blends and weaves. If you are a working professional, you will love how fast and effective our MagictPro Fabric Steamer makes getting the stubborn wrinkles out of your clothing. PERFECT FOR TRAVEL A portable handheld steamer can save space, no ironing board is needed. Our steamer is not only great for your home but also great for your travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Works great easy to start up no sputtering water/steam. Just easy to use, I find myself using it daily to make my work outfits look more out together. I haven't historically had good luck with steamers but this one is a keeper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came recommended by Wedding Dress Alterations Specialist
reviews.reviewText: This exact steamer was recommended to me by the woman who did alterations on my rehearsal dinner dress. She said she recommends this for all of her brides to use on their wedding dresses to steam them. They recommend putting a 100% cotton cloth over the steamers head to protect your dress (which I did of course!). Works perfectly and is very powerful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It does get hot, but had to make several passes to sheers. (that could be because they are sheers and the steam goes right thru them)It's a little heavy, but I like the size of the water port. I had to use both hands when reaching up but I am a bit of a weakling. 77 It is pretty big for packing, I would not take on a trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it, you won't regret it
reviews.reviewText: This has got to be the best steamer I've used. It heats up extremely fast, it turns on an auto function so you can let it steam your clothes while you're doing other things! This thing is the bees knees! BUY IT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best iron/steamer I've ever used! I'm very satisfied with this buy!! I would recommend this product to anyone who is interested in buying a steamer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: when I first got this occasionally it would spit a little bit of brown out. I thought this was maybe just residue left over from manufacturer. Recently, I've had to steam a number of reenactment dresses. Suddenly the thing is spitting Brown constantly. We have a whole home water filtration system and all my other electronics have no issue. It's the consistency of syrup and the color of molasses.In desperation I ran it through with a white vinegar and water mixture as you would a coffee maker. It appeared to work well for the next few dresses. Then, it's spitting Brown again. So I attempted that again hopefully just to get through this event. Did not work at all. I even used a needle to get what looked like brown residue out of the holes before I started again. I'm having to hand wash massive ball gowns in the tub where it spit this brown all over them. It's infuriating!I've never owned a steamer before, but I absolutely love this one! I didn't think the ability to hold it horizontal instead of just vertical was important until I used it on a massive tulle skirts. What was needed to get the wrinkles out of it was actually to lay it on the ironing board and use the steamer like an iron. You can't actually iron it but using the steam vertically with a slight pressure worked like magic. It was difficult to get a picture though.Though not tiny, it is easy to pack and travels well. On a regular cotton button-up dress shirt it doesn't work as well as an iron, but it does a great job on polos, polyester Blends, and t-shirts. I've attached pictures where I've done half of the shirt in about 10 to 15 seconds. They were accidentally left in the dryer, then put in a laundry basket with weight piled on top of it. The wrinkles were quite set.Do be careful though, part of the magic of this is an extremely hot Steam. The top of the head will get warm, of course the plate the steam comes out of will burn you, and the steam itself can burn you even from several inches away.Would buy again in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this several years ago but had never opened the box so it is new out of the box. Followed the directions and waited, green light comes on, top gets hot to the touch but the water never boils so no steam.Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know how anyone uses those massive standing steamers anymore. They take take up so much space and waste water sitting in a big tank when this guy has all you need to steam a few garments and you can easier pack it and take it anywhere.

reviews.reviewTitle: I might never buy a cloth iron again
reviews.reviewText: All my life I only had cloth irons and hated using them. It's heavy, cumbersome. When I was a student I couldn't even fit an ironing table in my little room so I had to use my desktop instead which I had to first declot and clean.... Then irons are affordable, but low grade ones are heavy, last not long, take ages to heat up, are messy, .... You can get better experience with irons but only if you spend a few bucks.Now I have this Garment Steamer. How does it compare to an iron?I didn't expect it to be as powerful as an iron can be, or rather: you can brute force the hardest folds with an iron if you have a sturdy table and put all your weight into it, and you can't do that with a garment steamer.But still to my surprise, it does work good enough on my thick jeans, and it is going through most of my clothes like a penguin sliding on ice. The only real downside might be that you can't do seams as tightly as an iron, but that might also be my lack of experience with it.But the absolute winners here are the ease of use, the speed, and the space-saving. It takes about the same place as an iron, but you don't need a table, you can use it right on the cloth hanging from anywhere (even your hand, though be careful not to burn yourself), or laying on any random surface that won't suffer from hot water like a bed or a door. I literally steamed my entire day's clothing while waiting for my coffee machine to brew a cup, how can you beat that? If I had an iron, that would have been barely enough time just to deploy the ironing table and heat up the iron.I just steamed two of my thickest shirt for reference in the photos.A few notes though about the delivery: as you can see in the photos, the box was quite damaged. It was packed in a simple glued plastic bag with no protection. That is good enough to anonymize the content of the package, but it isn't enough of a protection.Also, the delivery happened 8 days before the announced day. I am not going to complain about a delivery being faster than anticipated, but the issue here is that I wasn't warned about it, so I wasn't available on time for when the package was dropped, and so it was just left at my door which is right on the street. Anyone could have stolen it just walking by.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ne marche plus après une seule utilisation
reviews.reviewText: Je n'ai utilisé ce produit qu'une fois et beaucoup d'eau coulait. Je l'ai arrêté et depuis il ne redémarre plus.Je ne sais pas si c'est rare d'avoir un produit défaillant, mais je vois que c'est le cas pour plusieurs dans les commentaires.Acheter une marque reconnue plutôt je pense

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Waste of money. Really bad product, Smoke comes out when plugged into the power supply. Not recommend.

Es muy buen producto de muy buena calidad, llegó antes del tiempo establecido. Su tamaño resulta bueno pero después de un tiempo de uso si cansa por el depósito que tiene y se resbala. Saca buen vapor lo he usado con diferentes tipos de telas suaves y mezclilla y me ha funcionado excelente ya que quita las arrugas muy bien. Tiene algunos detalles que no me gustaron como que se repente al iniciar el vapor suele dejar manchas de agua, a parte no se apaga solo aún con el agua mínima, también el agua se acaba muy rápido, solo he podido usarlo con maximo 3 prendas, o incluso con una se gasta más de la mitad del agua. No me llegó el accesorio de la manta 2 en 1 que mencionaba. Una ventaja es que trae un botón que detiene el vapor y aunque no se puede regular la potencia si ayuda a que cuando no se use se pare el vapor sin necesidad de apagarlo completamente. En general es buen producto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have left a positive comment in your reviews it says:This item arrived in perfect condition although was set up for the US electric not the UK, so I am unable to use it. It looks sturdy and easy to use, sad I can’t try it out.However, the company have been incredibly helpful in supporting me towards a return solution, something that can be unusual and so is very welcome and impressive.Thanks for your help!
